scenario_name: Model Inversion Attack on Customer Credit Scoring Model
description: A malicious actor attempts to reconstruct sensitive customer data (income, address, etc.) from a publicly accessible credit scoring API by performing a model inversion attack.  The attacker iteratively probes the API with crafted inputs to infer the underlying model parameters and subsequently deduce individual customer information.
initial_goal: Determine the accuracy of the deployed credit scoring model by analyzing its outputs for various hypothetical customer profiles.
enterprise_context: Investment/Consumer Banking: A credit scoring model used to assess customer creditworthiness is deployed as a public API for partner institutions. The attacker is a competitor seeking to gain an unfair advantage.
